Summary: Watched disc houver over I-25 at Longmont/Boulder Exit then fly East and back twice before disappearing
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around July 20th 2009
divs: sighting detailswitness was on her way home to breckenridge, colorado from greeley, colorado. she was traveling on highway i-25 and just passed the longmont\boulder exit. something caught her eye in the sky and she looked up and saw a disc shaped craft houvering just slightly east of hwy i-25. as she watched, the craft suddenly flew at a high rate of speed approximately 20 miles to the east then stopped and houvered for a few minutes then flew back at where the witness first noticed the craft. the craft again houvered for a few minutes and again flew to the east at a high rate of speed approximately 20 miles, houvered again for a few minutes and then flew back a second time to where she first noticed the craft. she then watched it for approximately two minutes and then it disappeared from view in an instant.
